On the distant planet of Somnoria, dreams were not mere figments of imagination; they were the very fabric of existence. Each night, the inhabitants, ethereal beings of light, gathered in the Luminescent Forest, where they shared their dreams through radiant beams of color. The trees absorbed these dreams, transforming them into vibrant flowers that bloomed with the dawn. One day, a curious traveler from Earth landed, fascinated by the spectacle. He whispered his wildest dream, and to his amazement, the flowers danced and sang, weaving his story into the tapestry of Somnoria, reminding him that dreams, when shared, could change worlds.
